name: sandpapering
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
sandpaper
to rub a surface with sandpaper in order to make it smoother: He sandpapered the rough edges. You should gently sandpaper the walls smooth before painting them.
More examplesFewer examplesMy fingers feel like they've been sandpapered.The walls must be straight and well sandpapered for the wallpaper to stick well.We covered the counter with vinyl and sandpapered it down for a weathered effect.
